timeline.message: Expose AuthorizationRules on Queue and Topic options.
Rename AuthorizationRule -> AuthorizationRuleImpl. Add an implementation of SharedAccessAuthorizationRule.
Fixing serialization and replacing global namespace.
Fix assumption based on if it is playback.

timeline.bodyText: Should there be else when it is not instance of CreateQueueBody, should we log it ?
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

replies.bodyText: If it's not an instance, it will just be the normal case where can return as is. This is a special case.
replies.author: conniey
